SERVICESS_DATA.title: Dr. Commerce
SERVICESS_DATA.description: You want to be at the forefront of Digital Innovation, but your eCommerce platform is not keeping up. Engage Dr. Commerce to uncover insights, reduce churn and increase engagement!

SERVICESS_DATA.title: UNIVERSAL COMMERCE
SERVICESS_DATA.description: Confidently manage your entire eCommerce ecosystem under one simple contract. Use Universal Commerce to unify and simplify your Commerce operations!
